organization.$: The School of Internet of Things Engineering

head.citation-title: Underwater color image enhancement based on quaternion and fuzzy morphological sieves
head.abstracts: Underwater color image enhancement is an important issue in underwater vision field. The non-uniform brightness caused by illumination often severely affects the image enhancement effect in underwater image processing. In this paper, color fuzzy morphological sieves are first utilized to improve the non-uniform illumination condition. And then, the geometrical rotations in color space are computed with quaternion. By setting the background pixels of the water areas of the processed images to gray or low saturation colors while remaining the object pixel color unchanged, the difference between background and foreground colors of the image is increased. Comparison experiment results show that the proposed new color image enhancement method corrects the color unbalance and is especially suitable for processing the underwater color images with non-uniform lighting.
